entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
